text: Joseph Holland (born 21 April 1993) is an English footballer who plays as a midfielder. ==Career== ===College and youth=== Holland moved to the United States in 2012 to play college soccer at Hofstra University, where he played until 2016, including a red-shirted year in 2013. he also played for balham blazers FC While at college, Holland played with USL PDL clubs Long Island Rough Riders and Ventura County Fusion. ===Professional=== On 13 January 2017, Holland was selected 10th overall in the 2017 MLS SuperDraft by Houston Dynamo. He signed with Houston on 1 March 2017. He made his professional debut on 22 April 2017, playing 62 minutes for Houston's United Soccer League affiliate side, Rio Grande Valley FC Toros, during a 1–0 loss to Tulsa Roughnecks. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:English expatriate footballers Category:English footballers Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Hofstra Pride men's soccer players Category:Long Island Rough Riders players Category:Ventura County Fusion players Category:Houston Dynamo players Category:Rio Grande Valley FC Toros players Category:Pittsburgh Riverhounds SC players Category:Birmingham Legion FC players Category:Houston Dynamo draft picks Category:USL League Two players Category:Major League Soccer players Category:USL Championship players Category:English expatriate sportspeople in the United States
title: Joe Holland (footballer)
